name: Dark Forest: Lost Story VR
description:
Dark Forest: Lost Story VR is a unique horror game which includes a whole series of stories about demons and ghosts. Playing this game you’ll have an opportunity not just to get a lot of adrenaline, but also to learn something new and interesting. Because the aim of the game isn’t limited by scaring the player; but it also gives him a chance to look at some well-known things from a different perspective.



Here you’ll meet Baba Yaga who can feel a man, feed him with a rich dinner, help him go to sleep and even give him a magic ball of wool. But who is this kind old lady? And why does she feel a man, but not see? You’ll find it out soon.

Baba Yaga is not enough for you? Then let’s look at (this chapter will be available in the next update) Killers Creepers! Because most of you think that this is a scary man who doesn’t want you to gather some notes. We can assure you, that’s not what this is about. As this story has a lot of secrets and riddles, that you’ll have to solve or die.



Stories in the game:
Baba Yaga - (available)
Killers Creepers - (coming soon)

Eight reasons to download Dark Forest: Lost Story right now:
→ Lots of scary monsters and beasts.
→ A bunch of stories that will make you look at the world from a different perspective.
→ Gripping and unexpected plots that will never leave you indifferent.
→ Different world that you can visit.
→ It’s up to you to decide whether you should hide or run.
→ Stunning graphics for VR.
→ The sound is absolutely amazing and scary at the same time.
→ A perfect horror game: intense gameplay, spooky monsters, sudden screamers and the atmosphere that will palsy you with fear.
